title: Plow
description: Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Tuck your chin into your chest and with an exhale slowly roll down one vertebra at a time. Align hips over shoulders Push tops of shoulders into floor Soften tongue and throat Modification: Bring feet wide and hold onto ankles. Avoid this pose if you have a neck injury.
